content:
Hi all,

We seem to have come across an interesting bug.
If we send a bundle of patients (bundle size of 500) to HAPI FHIR (Docker version 5.4.2) and we subsequently do a _history call (tested with count size of 20 and 50) we get duplicated records in the result set. It seems that 20 records from the first page subsequently get duplicated towards the end of the result set. We have been able to recreate this multiple times.

Has anyone else seen this behaviour before?
And should I log this as an issue on the GitHub issues page?
Thanks Jens, I have logged an issue on the GitHub issues page
